title: Spinach, tomato and mushroom savoury crepes
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '350ml milk', '2 tablespoons butter', '30g buckwheat flour', '100g plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons butter', '40g cremini mushrooms, sliced', '40g oyster mushrooms, sliced', '180g diced tomatoes', '60g baby spinach leaves', '4 teaspoons butter, divided', '125g grated Gruyere cheese, divided']
